div.head: Medicine of the orientals against all maladies
div.ab:
Dry rosemary in the month of May, then fill this bowl with powder of it, and put a lit charcoal on top. And, receive the
smoke by a quite tightened mouth, and a part will come out by your nose. But if you want to purge the head also pinch the nose. Against colds, rheums, and other maladies.
